title: Kyler Murray's Press Conference
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss Kyler Murray’s press conference after signing his 5 year extension with the Cardinals, what Kyler’s deal means for Lamar Jackson and the Patriots not naming Offensive or Defensive coordinators.

itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Kyler Murray's post-extension press conference and the Patriots aren't naming coordinators.
